creator: Unify Software and Solutions GmbH & Co. KG
descriptionHtml:
Unify Phone enables organisations of all sizes to embrace the benefits of Unify Video by RingCentral, including cloud-based high-quality audio and video meetings, team messaging, file and screen sharing while continuing to leverage your investment in Unify OpenScape communication technologies.

Unify Phone enables seamless hybrid working – tight native integration allows adoption of cloud technologies where they make pragmatic sense while maintaining greater control where it matters.

Here’s how Unify Phone simplifies and smooths your cloud adoption journey.

Tightly integrate your existing OpenScape system and provider for calling
Native integration with Unify Video requires no onboarding.
Advanced mobility functionality with seamless call movement between devices.
Powerful call features including second call, call transfer and merge*.

A Unify Phone add-on subscription is required for your specific OpenScape platform.
*Feature capabilities may vary based upon the existing OpenScape platform you have.Unify Phone enables organisations of all sizes to embrace the benefits of Unify Video by RingCentral, including cloud-based high-quality audio and video meetings, team messaging, file and screen sharing while continuing to leverage your investment in Unify OpenScape communication technologies.

*Feature capabilities may vary based upon the existing OpenScape platform you have.
descriptionShort: Unify Phone brings advanced mobility and call features for OpenScape platforms

title:

2.1.68-3

container.value: Unify Software and Solutions GmbH & Co. KG

Unify Software and Solutions GmbH & Co. KG
Otto-Hahn-Ring 6
81739 Munich
Germany

creator: Mitel Android
descriptionHtml:
Transform your workplace communication with Unify Phone - the ultimate unified communications solution for organizations of all sizes and deployment types.
Leverage your existing Mitel / Unify voice platforms and embrace the future of work.

Key Features:
- Seamless hybrid working: Office, home, or on-the-move.
- Cloud-based client technology with tight integration to existing voice platforms
- Single business number across all devices
- Advanced mobility with uninterrupted call movement
- Powerful PBX features in easy-to-use web and mobile clients
- Integration with Office365 contacts, Microsoft Exchange, and Google
- Bi-directional presence synchronisation with Microsoft Teams
- Integration with existing voicemail solutions

Benefits:
- Preserve your investment in existing voice infrastructure
- Gain cloud technology benefits from your existing deployment model
- Enhance team productivity and work flexibility
- Simplify deployment and user adoption
- Maintain control and privacy of voice communications
- Streamline professional customer and client interactions

Unify Phone seamlessly extends your Mitel and OpenScape systems enabling a smooth transition to modern communication tools. Experience the power of cloud flexibility combined with the reliability of your trusted voice platform.

Get started with Unify Phone today and revolutionize your business communication!

*Note: Feature availability may vary based on your existing Mitel / OpenScape platform.
Unify Phone add-on subscription required.

Google is a trademark of Google LLC.
Microsoft Teams and Microsoft Exchange / Exchange Online are trademarks of the Microsoft group of companies.
descriptionShort: Unify Phone is a seamless Hybrid Cloud UC Solution

appDetails.developerAddress:
Mitel Networks
4000 Innovation Drive,
Kanata, Ontario, K2K 3K1, Canada
appDetails.developerName: Mitel Android

- Simplify deployment and user adoption
- Maintain control and privacy of voice communications
- Streamline professional customer and client interactions

Unify Phone seamlessly extends your Mitel and OpenScape systems enabling a smooth transition to modern communication tools. Experience the power of cloud flexibility combined with the reliability of your trusted voice platform.

Get started with Unify Phone today and revolutionize your business communication!

*Note: Feature availability may vary based on your existing Mitel / OpenScape platform.
Unify Phone add-on subscription required.

- Advanced mobility with uninterrupted call movement

- Integration with Office365 contacts, Microsoft Exchange, and Google
- Bi-directional presence synchronisation with Microsoft Teams
- Integration with existing voicemail solutions
